title: Add streaming support for Anthropic API format
description:
Implement SSE streaming in Anthropic format for Claude Code.

## Requirements
- Stream responses using Anthropic's SSE event format
- Support message_start, content_block_start, content_block_delta, message_delta, message_stop events
- Handle streaming errors properly

## Technical Details
- Update src/routes/anthropic.ts to handle stream=true
- Implement event types: message_start, content_block_start, content_block_delta, content_block_stop, message_delta, message_stop
- Convert Copilot streaming format to Anthropic streaming format

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Streaming events sent in correct Anthropic format
- [ ] Claude Code can receive and display streaming responses
- [ ] Stream errors handled gracefully

title: Implement Anthropic Messages API endpoint (/v1/messages)
description:
Create the main Anthropic API endpoint that Claude Code uses for chat completions.

## Requirements
- POST /v1/messages endpoint that accepts Anthropic Messages API format
- Support for streaming and non-streaming responses
- Proper error handling with Anthropic-compatible error format

## Technical Details
- Create src/routes/anthropic.ts with the endpoint
- Accept messages array, model, max_tokens, temperature, stream, system
- Return responses in Anthropic format with content blocks

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Endpoint returns valid Anthropic Messages API response
- [ ] Streaming works with SSE format (content_block_delta events)
- [ ] Error responses match Anthropic error format

title: Implement Claude model mapping to Copilot Anthropic models
description:
Map Claude model names from Claude Code to GitHub Copilot's Anthropic model endpoints.

## Requirements
- Map model names: claude-opus-4-5-20250514 -> claude-opus-4.5, etc.
- Support listing available Claude models via /v1/models endpoint
- Handle fallback for unknown model names

## Technical Details
- Create model mapping in src/config/models.ts or src/utils/model-mapper.ts
- Update config to include Copilot's Anthropic API endpoints
- Add /v1/models endpoint for Claude Code compatibility

## Model Mappings
- claude-opus-4-5-20250514 -> claude-opus-4.5
- claude-sonnet-4-20250514 -> claude-sonnet-4
- claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022 -> claude-3.5-sonnet
- claude-3-5-haiku-20241022 -> claude-3.5-haiku

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Model names correctly mapped
- [ ] /v1/models returns available Claude models
- [ ] Unknown models handled gracefully

title: Create Anthropic service for request/response translation
description:
Build the service layer to translate between Anthropic API format and GitHub Copilot format.

## Requirements
- Convert Anthropic messages format to Copilot prompt format
- Convert Copilot responses back to Anthropic format
- Handle tool use, content blocks, and other Anthropic-specific features

## Technical Details
- Create src/services/anthropic-service.ts
- Export functions: convertAnthropicToCopilot, convertCopilotToAnthropic
- Handle system prompts as separate field

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Anthropic messages correctly converted to Copilot format
- [ ] Copilot responses correctly converted to Anthropic content blocks
- [ ] Unit tests for translation functions
